properties.areaDesc: Waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR from 10 to 60 nm; Coastal waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Hazardous Seas Warning issued January 21 at 2:08PM PST until January 22 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, west swell 14 to 17 feet at
15 seconds expected. For the Gale and Hazardous Seas Warnings,
south winds increasing to 25 to 35 kt with occasional gusts to
45 kt. Seas becoming steep to very steep at 10 to 14 feet due to
a combination of swell and short-period wind waves.

* WHERE...For the Small Craft Advisory, all areas. For the Gale
Warning, mostly between 5 and 40 NM north of Cape Blanco. For
the Hazardous Seas Warning, all areas.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 10 AM PST Wednesday.
For the Gale Warning, from 10 AM to 10 PM PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds and very steep seas could capsize or
damage vessels. Low visibility conditions are expected.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid strong winds and very steep
seas. Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or
secure the vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 10 PM PST WEDNESDAY... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 10 PM PST WEDNESDAY
